lcObjectives.title: Objective
lcObjectives.lcObjectivesStem: Identify the responsibilities of a person working in the plumbing industry.

lcObjective.p: State the personal characteristics of a professional.

dlentry.dd: : A set of principles and values that guide an individual’s conduct.

lcInstruction.p: To be a successful plumber, you must be able to produce finished products of high quality in a minimum amount of time. You have probably heard the phrase “on time and on (or under) budget.” Take a moment to really think about what this phrase means. It means that the job is completed by the deadline, and that it does not cost more than what was originally expected.
